properties.name: 114 West 70th Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 114 West 70th Street, New York, NYTriple MINT Renovated COND-OP- with charming views of lush greenery. Picture Perfect, Move-In condition- all High-End finishes/appliances- Open Eat-In Kitchen- Custom Built-Ins/Fabulous Closets- Picture Perfect home in the Sweet Spot of the Upper West Side at W. 70th and Columbus Ave. Very well kept/well run building has a fabulous Live-In Super and a Gorgeous Roof Terrace. Only a block from Central Park and a few short blocks from Lincoln Center and all Transportation! Renting is allowed. Dogs are welcome. Maintenance is low. Pied-a-terre\'s are welcome!

properties.name: 140 West 69th Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 140 West 69th Street, New York, NYOwner moved OUT OF THE COUNTRY!!!!!!!!! Corner one bedroom, with wonderful 10.5 foot height lofty Ceilings, Oversized Windows, and Prewar Moldings. Original Fireplace Mantle is decorative and charming. Sunny eastern and southern exposure- you even get a clip of trees from Central Park from your eastern Views! Pied-a-terres, Guarantors, and Parents buying for children

properties.name: 171 West 71st Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 171 West 71st Street, Upper West Side, NYDon\'t miss this opportunity to make your home this BEAUTIFUL Edwardian Five with all of its turn of the century grandeur and details restored here at the historic DORILTON! From the moment you walk into the breathtaking foyer with the first of 3 fireplaces, Venetian plaster & stained glass bay window, it\'s clear that "the building\'s Beaux-Arts, Parisian grandeur abounds!" An arched doorway leads to the sunny & spacious living room. The extra-large fifth room wiith its French doors, antique wood paneling & beamed ceiling works perfectly as either the 2nd bedroom or formal dining room. Then there is the master bedroom, which boasts a huge walk-in closet. You won\'t have to sacrifice modern conveniences in this updated, windowed kitchen with tons of cabinets & even a W/D! A charming maid\'s room with a half-bath complete this classic. A real bonus of this apartment is being able to step out your backdoor into the peaceful oasis of the furnished and landscaped common terrace! It\'s been said of this 1902 NYC Landmark that the Dorilton is "a masterpiece of urban architecture" that "boasts the most attractive entrance gate in the city."

properties.name: 2000 Broadway
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 2000 Broadway, New York, NYTruly One of a Kind Huge 602 Square Foot Triple Mint Designer Alcove Studio with Open Garden Views and Excellent Light. Exquisitely finished Kitchen and Bathroom. Incredible Walk-in closet and built-in storage throughout. Custom Murphy Bed tucks away to allow entertaining with a living and dining room area! Custom Lighting, and Audiovisual complete this picture perfect apartment just one block from Lincoln Center and next to Central Park! Ideal Pied a Terre or Full time home for the most discerning buyer. Located at The Copley Condominium and Club- A full service condo with 24 hour doorman, concierge, Indoor Pool, Health Club, Backyard Terrace, and more! Ultra-Prime Upper Westside Neighborhood...

properties.name: 230 Riverside Drive
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 230 Riverside Drive, New York, NYOpen Southern Views including partial River View to the West- This Fabulous High Floor One Bed Condo in Brand NEW Prewar Conversion has Five Unobstructed Windows and Excellent Layout. Phenominal Closet Space fully outfitted with Italian Melamine Walk-In California Closets. Kitchen equipped with Miele, Subzero and Fisher Paykel Chrome finished appliances, and Bathroom with Calacutta Marble tile, and radiant heat under the floors... All in a Triple Mint Development conveniently located off of Riverside Park with 24 hour Doorman/Conceirge, Gym, Common Garden and Resident\'s Lounge. Pet Friendly. Investor Friendly.

properties.name: 260 West End Avenue
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 260 West End Avenue, New York, NYMint Oversized 1 Bedroom / 1.5 Bath in impeccable move-in condition is the Best Deal in the heart of the Upper West Side!!!!!! Southern light illuminates the large living room. Additional dining alcove to accomodate a table and chairs allows you to enjoy a homemade meal alone or with guests. Prepare food in a spacious, custom, high-end, open kitchen with counter island for stools. Restored beamed ceilings and detail throughout maintain the authentic pre-war detail of the exquisite entry lobby to this well established West End Ave Co-op situated at W 72nd Street. Excellent Storage/Closet space. 2 Bathrooms (One full bath en-suite, one powder room off the living room) are meticulous- Featuring a soaking tub, rain shower, natural stone, and carrera marble. The large exterior-vented washer/dryer is a real added bonus as well! This home could not be more conveniently located near all transportation, Riverside AND Central Parks ,Lincoln Center, and all shops/restaurants! Pets ok. Parents buying for children ok. Must see!

properties.name: 301 East 75th Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 301 East 75th Street, New York, NYSunny, Oversized One-Bedroom in Prime Upper East Side location with Spacious livingroom that includes Dining Area. Roomy Bedroom currently accommodates a King Size bed, an office area, and large bureaus. The Galley Kitchen is in impeccable condition. Three large closets. All in a truly exceptional Full-Service Co-op with Newly Renovated, High-End Lobby (with friendly and very helpful staff!), an Exercise Room, and a Stunning Roofdeck! Pets are welcome. Building financials are outstanding and lead to an UNBELIEVABLY Low Maintenance at 15/month! Neighborhood is super convenient and will be even more accessible with completion of the Second Ave Subway. Space-Affordability-Style-Location-Light- High Floor---What else could one ask for???!!!!!!

properties.name: 329 West 108th Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 329 West 108th Street, New York, NYBeautiful, Oversized Pre-War 1Bedroom/ 1.5 Bath + BALCONY Reduced to a FIRESALE PRICE! The almost 11ft. ceilings and WOODBURNING FIREPLACE add such Turn of the Century Charm and Grandeur! Every room is Oversized and Beautifully Renovated: the 22ft. x 19ft. Living Room has a full wall of floor to ceiling built-in storage, the 13.5 x 14.5ft. Bedroom has a HUGE Walk-in Closet, and the 14ft. x 9 ft. Windowed Kitchen opens onto the 60 sq. ft. Balcony for dining al fresco! The Cloisters is an intimate 24 unit co-op nestled between Riverside Park and the restaurants, shops, and subway on Broadway just a few blocks from Columbia University. Truly Special! A Rare Find.! An Unbelievable Price!

properties.name: 49 West 72nd Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 49 West 72nd Street, New York, NYPicture Perfect Prewar! Perched on the 9th Floor of an intimate sized co-op on this Prime Central Park Block, a very special treasure awaits! Renovated kitchen and bath, Corner Windows, and Southern Exposure are just a few of the attributes of this UWS home. Comfortable sized bedroom and Living Room accomodate dining area and work station. A dream pied-a-terre or first home- only steps to the Boat House/Sheep\'s Meadow, Lincoln Center, 72nd St Express Subway, Buses, and great shopping/restaurants on Columbus Ave... This location can\'t be beat! No dogs (Cats ok), Pied-a-terres welcome, No Guarantors/Co-purchasers. Low Maintenance.

properties.name: 61 West 62nd Street
properties.description: Posted by Jessicacohen 61 West 62nd Street, New York, NYMove-in ready one-bedroom apartment that gets good light throughout the day. Apartment can be purchased fully furnished. Perfect for anyone who wants to live in the most sought-after West Side neighborhood. Steps to Lincoln Center, Time-Warner Center with fine shops and Whole Foods, Central Park, all transportation, restaurants and more. The Harmony is a full-service modern co-op with 24-hour doorman, NY Sports Club in the building (separate, but residents get a discount), newly renovated lobby and hallways. Bike storage and central laundry room as well. Pied-a-terres welcome. One dog allowed per apartment.
